xwikidoc.title: LightboxTranslations
xwikidoc.content:
# Admin section admin.lightbox=라이트박스 ### Missing: admin.lightbox.description=Configure the image lightbox gallery ### Missing: XWiki.Lightbox.LightboxConfigurationClass_isLightboxEnabled=Enable the lightbox ### Missing: XWiki.Lightbox.LightboxConfigurationClass_isLightboxEnabled.hint=Enable the possibility to open content images in a lightbox.
# Gallery template ### Missing: image.lightbox.autoPlay.title=Slideshow ### Missing: image.lightbox.caption.label=Caption ### Missing: image.lightbox.imageId.title=Image ID ### Missing: image.lightbox.imageId.copy.title=Copy image ID ### Missing: image.lightbox.imageId.copy.copied=Copied to clipboard ### Missing: image.lightbox.imageId.permalink=Permalink ### Missing: image.lightbox.date.label=Date ### Missing: image.lightbox.download.title=Download ### Missing: image.lightbox.escape.title=Escape ### Missing: image.lightbox.fileName.label=File name ### Missing: image.lightbox.fullscreen.title=Fullscreen ### Missing: image.lightbox.gallery.title=Image gallery ### Missing: image.lightbox.nextSlide.title=Next image ### Missing: image.lightbox.prevSlide.title=Previous image ### Missing: image.lightbox.publisher.label=Image publisher ### Missing: image.lightbox.toggler.label=Open the image actions
